response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product which has been meticulously designed and developed to revolutionize your industry. This product comes with cutting-edge features and capabilities that can significantly enhance your operations and efficiency. Given its high quality and versatility, we believe it's worth more than its face value of $15,000. Considering its immense potential impact on your business, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product for $18,000. This special offer includes a comprehensive warranty and a dedicated support team to ensure smooth integration and ongoing assistance. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or have any questions.", "product_price": 18000}
